English:
Some time after their botched operation to capture a known Palestinian terrorist,
a team of Israeli agents starts to get killed off one by one. Their leader must
get to the bottom of things before the killer(s) plan is complete.


Met o.a.
Christopher Lambert, Kerry Fox en Vincent Regan
